titleStmt.title: To our very louing friends the iustices of assize for the counties of Northampton, Warwicke, Leicester, Derbie, Nottingham, Rutland, and Lincolne after our very heartie commendations, whereas His Maiestie was mooued for diuers iust and waightie considerations, to grant foorth his letters pattents for a generall collection to made within the kingdome of England, and dominion of Wales, towards the repairing of the ancient hauen of the port townes of Dunwich, Southwold, and Walberswicke in the countie of Suffolke ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.
England and Wales. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, and Iohn Bill ...,

notesStmt.note: Second part of title from first five lines of text.
Signed: G. Cant., Fr. Verulam Canc., E Worcester., [and 9 others].
Dated: From Whit-hall this 12. of Iuly. 1620.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
